turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi, how can I help you today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Yeah, man. I really need a cup of Joe, and I wanted to see if you can get me an order of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can help with that. Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I wanted to order from a from a Peet's here in Sunnyvale.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. And what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have hankering for a golden caffè latte, preferably the largest size possible.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: That drink sounds delicious. And did you want that iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want it hot and 2% milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. So your order was 1 large hot golden cafe latte with 2% milk from peet's in sunnyvale.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $4.50 is the total. Would you like me to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. I've placed the order, it'll b ready in 10 minutes. I've also sent the receipt to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Did you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: If you send me the receipt then I think will are good to go.
